QuestData.Title: Stolen Property
QuestData.Description: Our revered lady has sent me to aid you in your task. She wants you to retrieve the stolen Crucible of Nazsharin and bring it back here as soon as you can.$B$BShe grows impatient to start the ritual of summoning so that we might fully begin our preparations for war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Crucible of Nazsharin.$B$BThis task is part of a Naz'jar Battlemaiden vision. If needed, use the Blade of the Naz'jar Battlemaiden at a time focus to return to the vision.
QuestData.RewardText: The crucible looks far too heavy to carry on your own, but more than enough naga forces remain to prepare it for transport.
